title: Ep. 17 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: In this episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave, Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer discuss things they learned from their fathers, their feelings about over emotional people, and their new weight loss challenge. Tom also shares a cool story about about a guy who was not nice to his mom. What did YOU learn from your dad? Who do YOU think will win this weight loss challenge?
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
